Detailed Description

Describes the spirit:adHocConnection element in an IP-XACT document.

Specifies a connection that is made on a port-by-port basis and not done through the higher-level bus interface. These connections are between component instance ports or between component instance ports and ports of the encompassing component (in the case of a hierarchical component).

QList<PortRef> Design::AdHocConnection::externalPortReferences

OPTIONAL spirit:externalPortReference.
